mutants.code:
def count_beautiful_years(n: int) -> int:
    x = str(n)
    now = len(x)
    ans = (now - 1) * 9
    ans -= int(x[0])
    flag = 0
    for j in range(1, len(x)):
        if x[j] > x[j - 1]:
            break
        elif x[j] < x[j - 1]:
            flag = 1
            break
    ans -= flag
    return ans
